author: leif
msg: Fix a problem where a new permanent sample would be reset to a leased sample if the leased sample existed in a state file when the new configuration was loaded.  The lease now correctly remains permanent.

author: nicolaken
msg: With gamma = 0 batik does not insert gamma information in teh png, resulting in good looking rounded corners both in IE6 and FireFox 0.9.
Please check other browsers, whoever you are :-)

author: ekoneil
msg: Fixup classpath in the scoping module build file.
This references the Servlet 2.3 classes, which are still hanging out for Tomcat 4.x security integration that hasn't been ported to Servlet 2.4.

author: leif
msg: Modify the Meta generation so that meta files are only rewritten if their contents have changed.  This is necessary to keep Ant from rebuilding jars even when there were no changes to their contents.
